topic.title: Chapter 8
topic.shortdesc: Charlie gets Mr. Martin to his destination on time, and gets a new job.

section.title: A Happy Ending

image.alt: picture of Charlie with Engineer Bob, Mr. Martin and his daughter inside smiling as they go across the train tracks

section.p: Charlie got Mr. Martin to his daughter's piano recital on time (of course), and Susannah was just tickled pink to see her old friend Charlie again (of course), and they all went back to St. Louis together with Susannah pulling onyanking hell out of the train whistle the whole way.

fig.title: Charlie takes children around the new Amusement Park

image.alt: picture of Charlie with train cars attached carrying children around a park

section.p: Mr. Martin got Charlie and Engineer Bob a new jobgig pulling kids around the brand-new Mid-World Amusement Park and Fun Fair in California, and you will find them there to this day, pulling screaminglaughing children hither and thither in that world of lights and music and good, wholesome fun. Except for the occasional child or two who goes missing.
Engineer Bob's hair is white, and Charlie doesn't talk as much as he once did, but both of them still have plenty of zip and zowie.
And every now and then the children hear Charlie singing his old song in his soft, gruff voice.
